[12:12]	<PabloRubianes>	on your system there are some folders that you may not know what they are for:
[12:13]	<PabloRubianes>	the "bin" folder contains all the binaries for you programs
[12:14]	<PabloRubianes>	"boot" has the boot files to start the system
[12:14]	<mohi1>	ok
[12:14]	<PabloRubianes>	"etc" has configurations for the system (very important)
[12:15]	<PabloRubianes>	"home" are the files and folders of you (the user)
[12:15]	<tatica1>	ok
[12:15]	<PabloRubianes>	"lib" has the libraries fot the system
[12:16]	<PabloRubianes>	"media" is where the devices mount (cd-rom, dvd, or USB for example)
[12:16]	<PabloRubianes>	"sbin" binaries for the Super user
[12:17]	<PabloRubianes>	"tmp" temporal files
[12:17]	<PabloRubianes>	and there are others... all this folders are place in the root or "/"
